normalmap32.name: NormalMap32
normalmap32.description: Use 2D normal mapping to simulate multiple colored light sources on a texture, adding depth and creating the illusion of a 3D surface.

screen-x-resolution.name: Screen X iResolution [000]
screen-x-resolution.desc: Can be ignored for WebGL2 and WebGPU. For WebGL1 support forward: (round(LayerToCanvasX(layer,ViewportRight(layer),0)*PlatformInfo.DevicePixelRatio))

screen-y-resolution.name: Screen Y iResolution [001]
screen-y-resolution.desc: Can be ignored for WebGL2 and WebGPU. For WebGL1 support forward: (round(LayerToCanvasY(layer,0,ViewportBottom(layer))*PlatformInfo.DevicePixelRatio))

normal-scale-x.name: Normal Map Scale X [002]
normal-scale-x.desc: Normal Map Sprite X Scale (Width). (1) for original scale, (-1) is flipped. Required to support scaled and flipped sprite. Forward: (sprite.Width/sprite.ImageWidth)

normal-scale-y.name: Normal Map Scale Y [003]
normal-scale-y.desc: Normal Map Sprite Y Scale (Height). (1) for original scale, (-1) is flipped. Required to support scaled and flipped sprite. Forward: (sprite.Height/sprite.ImageHeight)

normal-angle.name: Normal Map Angle [004]
normal-angle.desc: Normal Map Sprite Angle. Required to support rotated sprite. Forward: (sprite.Angle)

light-max-id.name: Max Light ID [005]
light-max-id.desc: Highest light ID used (1 - 32). Disables all light IDs higher than defined number. Keep as low as possible for enhanced shader performance

ambient-intensity.name: Ambient Light Intensity [007]
ambient-intensity.desc: Ambient Light Intensity defines the perceived ambient brightness

light-1-pos-x.name: Light 1 X Position [009]
light-1-pos-x.desc: Light 1 Viewport Position (X-axis). 0 to 100 for left to right end of viewport. Forward: ((LayerToCanvasX(layer,LightSource.X,0))/(round(LayerToCanvasX(layer,ViewportRight(layer),0)))*100)

light-1-pos-y.name: Light 1 Y Position [010]
light-1-pos-y.desc: Light 1 Viewport Position (Y-axis). 0 to 100 for top to bottom end of viewport. Forward: ((LayerToCanvasY(layer,0,LightSource.Y))/(round(LayerToCanvasY(layer,0,ViewportBottom(layer)))*100)

light-1-pos-z.name: Light 1 Z Position [011]
light-1-pos-z.desc: Light 1 Depth Translation (Z-axis). Lower value to move away from camera, increase value to move towards the camera

light-1-clamp.name: Light 1 Clamp [013]
light-1-clamp.desc: Light 1 hard-edge circle (clamp) to dark. 0 to 100 for small to large circle. Depends on Linear and Quadratic Falloff

light-1-linear-falloff.name: Light 1 Linear Falloff [014]
light-1-linear-falloff.desc: Light 1 Linear Falloff - Linear decrease in intensity as distance from light source increases

light-1-quadratic-falloff.name: Light 1 Quadratic Falloff [015]
light-1-quadratic-falloff.desc: Light 1 Quadratic Falloff - Quadratic decrease in intensity as distance from light source increases

light-2-pos-x.name: Light 2 X Position [017]
light-2-pos-x.desc: Light 2 Viewport Position (X-axis). 0 to 100 for left to right end of viewport. Forward: ((LayerToCanvasX(layer,LightSource.X,0))/(round(LayerToCanvasX(layer,ViewportRight(layer),0)))*100)

light-2-quadratic-falloff.desc: Light 2 Quadratic Falloff - Quadratic decrease in intensity as distance from light source increases
